---
title:css面试题
---

### 1 实现三列布局，中间自适应，左右两边定宽

* 通过定位实现：

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
        position:relative;
    }
    #aside{
        position:absolute;
        left:0;
        top:0;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #content{
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        margin:0 100px;
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }
    #rightAside{
        right:0;
        top:0;
        position:absolute;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: goldenrod;

    }
</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="content"></div>
    <div id="rightAside"></div>
</div>
```

* 通过浮动实现: 左右元素优先渲染他们会占据位置，然后会渲染中间边框；

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
    }
    #aside{
        float:left;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #rightAside{
        float:right;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: goldenrod;

    }
    #content{
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        overflow:hidden;/**这个触发BFC布局*/
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }

</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="rightAside"></div>
    <div id="content"></div>

</div>
```

试想一下： 如果right和content元素换一下位置，会是如何渲染

```html
<div id="aside"></div>
<div id="content"></div>

<div id="rightAside"></div>
```

* 通过浮动实现，中间元素优先渲染，然后渲染左右元素

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
    }
    #content{
        float:left;
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        width:100%;
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }
    #content-wrap{
        margin:0 100px;
    }
    #aside{
        float:left;
        margin-left:-100%;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #rightAside{
        float:left;
        margin-left:-100px;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: goldenrod;

    }
</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="content">
        <div id="content-wrap">
            11 
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="rightAside"></div>
</div>
```

这里有个比较有意思的 margin-left

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
    }
    #content{
        float:left; /**这个属性是重点，float元素的浮动原理需要深刻了解*/
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        width:100%;
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }
    #aside{
        float:left;
        margin-left:-100%;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="content"></div>
    <div id="aside"></div>
</div>
```

* 通过flex布局实现

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
        display:flex;
    }
    #aside{
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #content{
        flex:1;
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }
    #rightAside{
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: goldenrod;

    }
</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="content"></div>
    <div id="rightAside"></div>
</div>
```

### 2 实现两列布局，左边固定，右边自适应

* 定位实现

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
        position:relative;
    }
    #aside{
        position:absolute;
        left:0;
        top:0;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #content{
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        margin-left:100px;
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }

</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="content"></div>
</div>
```

* 通过浮动实现

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
    }
    #aside{
        float:left;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #content{
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        margin-left:100px;
        word-break:break-all;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }

</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="content"></div>
</div>
```

* 通过浮动实现：左边栏优先渲染，然后渲染右边元素

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
    }
    #aside{
        float:left;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }
    #content{
        overflow:hidden;
        background-color: bisque;
        height:100%;
        word-wrap:break-word;
        word-break:break-all;
    }

</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="aside"></div>
    <div id="content">11deefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwef</div>
</div>
```

* 通过浮动实现：中间元素优先渲染，然后渲染左边元素

```html
<style>
    #container{
        height:200px;
    }
    #content{
        background-color: bisque;
        height:200px;
        width:100%;
        word-wrap:break-word;
        word-break:break-all;
        float:left;
    }
    #wrapContent{
        margin-left:100px;
    }
    #aside{
        margin-left:-100%;
        float:left;
        width:100px;
        height:100%;
        background-color: aquamarine;
    }


</style>
<div id="container">
    <div id="content">
        <div id="wrapContent">
            11deefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwedeefwefwefwef
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="aside"></div>

</div>
```



[参考](https://www.cnblogs.com/honoka/p/5161836.html)
